location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 92: Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to Henry Bartle Edward Frere, Commissioner in Scinde [Sindh], Kurachee [Karachi]

mods.abstract: In this letter, Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, writes to Henry Bartle Edward Frere, Commissioner in Scinde [Sindh], Kurrachee [Karachi], informing him that enclosed is a package of samples of piece goods in general demand in the northern part of Central Asia. Kemball refers to an earlier communication from Frere dated 21 April 1852 in which he made requests for such samples. The enclosed list of sixty-nine specimens gives a short description and price for each article.
